name: Avoid large Programs - too many Lines of Code
description: ABAP programs should have a reasonable size. This reports shows all the ABAP programs with more than 500 lines of code. 500 being a parameter.
output:
Associated to each ABAP Program with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of LoC
rationale: Large programs are more difficult to understand, and are a sign of a bad modularity of the code.
remediation: Review the design of the program to reduce its size.
